Articles.Content:
Those jambalaya holes at the second space center starting to piss you off? WHy not get back at them with the, biggest, meanest bomber on the market? the Camden Bomber!

The Camden Bomber is a large, heavy, slow bomber with great range that can take you and any explosive payload with you wherever you want (promise void if leaving continent)!

http://www./download/lqaaj1cm9r2fcxs/Camden_Class_Bomber.craft

While the bomber may pack one helluva punch, its pretty vulnerable to, well, pretty much anything, its not super stable, so, for ensured safety, why not have a swarm of K-42 Fighters?.

http://www./download/lnb8e774333z23z/K-42_Fighter.craft

Download Today!

Be sure to check out my personal group, the KU at - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39055-Hiring-Modded-Stock-Kerbal-Union-Aero-Astronautical-Association

And, more importantly, the KIDA - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39029-KIDA-Kerbal-Interplanetary-Defense-Administration

Edited July 7, 2013 by shoveycat
Thanks! I just wish i could add more armaments, but the bomber has a pretty unstable center of mass
That fighter looks huge. What range does it have?
Well, i made it about a third of the way around the planet with a bit over half fuel left going at a top speed of about 1100 MPS, even with a few spinouts taking me down to about 200 MPS
